name: Yummy Potato Wedges
description:
Warning: This game is graphically-intensive and might not run well on your machine! It was specifically developed for an RTX 3050 TI laptop. It is a 1-4 player split-screen game so you will need to connect at least one gamepad to play.

Concept

Explore the world and collect scattered artifacts. You can find them in boxes underwater, on beaches, or even on mountaintops. Sometimes artifacts are found in "rollers" which as the name implies, roll across the ground. You gotta chase them or you'll lose them!
 There are two loose objectives: obtain the highest score by collecting difficult boxes or by finding all 11 artifact types. It's more fun with more players!
Artifact and Mountain Boxes are worth 1 point,   Sea Boxes are worth 2 points and Rollers are worth 3 points.

Yummy Potato Wedges was created for Spud's Album release with the same name.  Artifacts in-game are inspired by various song references.

Controls

With Xbox controllers:
Left-Stick:  Movement (Click for dash)

Right-Stick:  View (Click for zoom)

A: Jump or swim

X: Menu

Y: Quick swap skins

B: Swim-down

The menu has 4 levels:
Minimap, Skins, Names, and Artifacts.
Swipe up and down to swipe through menus.
If you collect more than 5 artifacts of the same type, you can press "A"  to exchange some for score points!

Editor

To enter or exit edit mode, press "Enter" on your keyboard.
Player controls are mostly the same except:

Y: Quick swaps tools

D-Pad: Controls tool  type and brush size

Bumpers: Cycle through materials

To save the world, press "End" on the keyboard, and to load,  press "Home".
